Showers or thundershowers will occur at several places in the sea areas off the coast extending from
Puttalam to Hambantota via Mannar, Colombo and Galle. Showers or thundershowers will occur at
several places in the other sea areas around the island particularly during the evening or night.
Winds will be South-westerly and wind speed will be (25-35) kmph in the sea areas around the island.
Wind speed may increase up to (40-45) kmph in the sea areas off the coast extending from Chilaw to
Mullaitivu via Mannar and Kankasanthurai and from Hambanthota to Pottuvil.
The sea areas off the coast extending from Chilaw to Mullaitivu via Mannar and Kankasanthurai and
from Hambanthota to Pottuvil can be rough at times.
